Termitron::

"Termitron follows Lynxiz"said Termitron "Termitron thinks tha=
t this place is familiar... Termitron's Colony could be around"
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: We=
dnesday, May 09, 2001 7:57 PM
  Subject: Home


  ---Lynxiz---

  Lynxiz tr=
ots into the small frigid valley, her eyes peeled. Her breath 
  puffs a sw=
irling frosty mist into the crisp icy air. She stretches and 
  looks aroun=
d for signs of other robots. "Termitron, you see 
  anything?" Without real=
ly waiting for an answer, she continues 
  looking without much success. He=
r head tilts to look up at the 
  ridges surrounding the Valley, her nose t=
witches as she picks up 
  the scent of a deer, but she shurgs and continue=
s. "Termitron, we'll 
  go to that peak over there and take a look around,"=
 she points to a 
  large mountain that protrudes nearly to the cloud line.=
 "We might 
  be able to see something from there. I think I'll try a comml=
ink 
  broadcast but I don't think we'll get much in this valley, we're too=
 
  surrounded with obstructions... on the top maybe.." She finishes, 
  th=
e last part to herself. She starts plodding on to the peak, her fur 
  tuff=
ted ears perked and listening to see if Termitron follows.
